name: react-native-super-app
description: React Native Super App with Module Federation using Re.Pack and Zephyr

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:host && npm run install:mini1 && npm run install:mini2 && npm run install:mini3
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:mini1 && npm run bundle:mini2 && npm run bundle:mini3 && npm run bundle:host
scripts.test: npm run test:host && npm run test:mini1 && npm run test:mini2 && npm run test:mini3
scripts.lint: npm run lint:host && npm run lint:mini1 && npm run lint:mini2 && npm run lint:mini3
scripts.clean: npm run clean:host && npm run clean:mini1 && npm run clean:mini2 && npm run clean:mini3
scripts.clean:host: cd HostApp && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:mini1: cd MiniApp1 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:mini2: cd MiniApp2 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:mini3: cd MiniApp3 && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
